entities.name: NVIDIA CORPORATION
entities.description: NVIDIA Corporation is a technology company known for its graphics processing units (GPUs) and other advanced computing technologies. The document provided includes financial data and notes to the consolidated financial statements of NVIDIA Corporation and its subsidiaries.

entities.name: ARM
entities.description: ARM is a company mentioned in the context of an acquisition by NVIDIA Corporation. Further details about the acquisition can be found in Note 2 - Business Combination.

relationships.relationship_description: NVIDIA Corporation acquired ARM, as mentioned in the notes to the consolidated financial statements.
